channel.title: [Help] Via NPC'S
channel.description:
Ok, I have a big issue, when i teleport to Godwars all the Godwar npcs attack me ( the npcs you need to kill, 20 points to get in ) they all just attack you, i dont want them to attack you as soon as you teleport to Godwars, i only want them to attack when you hit them.
Best of regards, James

item.title: [Help] Via NPC'S
